description:
Another Magician of the Association, Fin was sent to investigate a possible Taboo connected to Itsuki being hidden by Astral. Fin met Honami during her Celtic magic field training and they restored the dying Celtic magic. Fin was much like a teacher to Honami.
Actually a member of the dark magic society Ophion and he too possess the Gramsight. He has the ability to know people`s wishes.
name: Fin Cruda
